response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds significant value to both of us. Given its exceptional quality and rarity, the product is worth $1,500,000 to me. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is a chance for you to secure a valuable asset at a discount, while also supporting my business. I believe this offer presents an excellent value proposition for you, and I look forward to discussing the details further with you. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
